title: First Thing
alt: Then I'm going to go on a weeks-long somatic hypermutation bender, producing ever-more targeted antibodies, while I continue to remain distanced and follow guidance from public health authorities.
transcript:
[Ponytail and Cueball are walking toward the right side of a single panel. Ponytail is gesturing with one arm.]Ponytail: The first thing I'm going to do after I get the vaccine?
Ponytail: Definitely make a bunch of spike proteins and engulf them with dendritic cells.
Ponytail: Then I'll probably display the antigens to my T-cells...
